Kali:

"Welcome to our ranks, Panzer"said Kali"Your weapon will come in a 
nano, in what aspects of fighting you are trained?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> Panzer::
> 
> She arrived and saluted Kali. "I am here to serve. Shivah will be 
> sending me a weapon to this location." Her predacon programing was 
> very strong and her loyalty to this group was very strong. "I will 
be 
> in need of orders. I am trained in many aspects of fighting."  She 
> stood at attention and awaited orders. 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Shivah:::
> > 
> > "Of course" replied the male by comm link "I send a drone with 
your 
> > future weapon where my sis is."
> >
